summary: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.
cast: Jeffrey Wright|Frances McDormand|Maleah Nipay-Padilla|Ryan Teeple|Jack McGraw|Marcus Scribner|Raymond Ochoa|Jack Bright|Peter Sohn|Steve Zahn|Mandy Freund|Steven Clay Hunter|A.J. Buckley|Anna Paquin|Sam Elliott|David Boat|Carrie Paff|Calum Grant|John Ratzenberger|Charlie Bright|Emily Davis|Tony Fucile|Zoe Larkin|Courtney Lockwood|Aidan McGraw|Ava Schaffer|Lena Schaffer
title: El viaje de Arlo
